name: Collab Minter
description:
Entry to a NFT-MAKER game jam (https://www.nft-maker.io/gamejam).

Controls

WASD / arrows - move
Tab - switch player
X / P - shoot

Used tools

  • Godot Engine
  • Inkscape
  • Audacity

Used assets:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-platform-tile
  • Music probably from opengameart.org, will find link later
  • CryptoHeroes.io characters
